Gong.Name: Gong_TDJ
Gong.Desc: Emperor Ye Tianxiong was a rough man, a heroic hero, and he overwhelmed his contemporaries. After becoming emperor, he issued the strongest voice: "I am the emperor, and I want to suppress all enemies." He chose to raise a hundred classics in a furnace, followed the path of self-cultivation, and set himself on the road to emperor himself, paving the way for the immortal. The "Tiandi Jing" is published
Gong.SelectDesc: The practice of this method is extremely difficult. There are many realms on each level and it takes a lot of time to complement the natural treasures. Hope to be careful. Do you want to choose this practice?

Stage.Name: Stage1
Stage.Desc: The first is to open up a sea of ​​bitterness-build a fountain of life-set up a bridge of God-reach the other shore.

Neck.Desc: The endless sea of ​​suffering that covers the wheel of life. Threshold of spiritual practice. Passing will open Xiuxian Avenue.[color=#D06508]\The lower the root bone of this bottleneck, the harder it is to break through.[/color]
One of the purposes of spiritual practice is to fully exhaust the sea of ​​suffering and turn it into a sweet spring of life.

The endless bitterness is bound to create life in the bitter sea, brewing vitality in the dullness, and casting the god bridge in the bitter sea.[color=#D06508]\The lower the root bone of this bottleneck, the harder it is to break through.[/color]
Sacrifice into an overpass, find the root, and the sacred bridge arrives like a rainbow.

Stage.Name: Stage3
Stage.Desc: The five deities in the Dao Palace have a great connection with them, which can generate Dao power and transform birth, which is really a place to feed.

Neck.Desc: Cultivation first cultivates the mind, the heart is strong, and the spirit is refined.[color=#D06508]\n Failure of a break may hurt you.[/color]

The heart belongs to fire, and the spleen and stomach belong to soil. Heart yang and normal life can promote the yang of the spleen and stomach.[color=#D06508]\n Failure of a break may hurt you.[/color]
Qi is attributed to the lungs, the lungs are directed toward the hundred veins, and the insemination is in the fur.[color=#D06508]\n Failure of a break may hurt you.[/color]

Kidney is the main water, and yang and yin are combined to maintain the body's water-liquid balance;Kidney bone,Plenty of kidney qi has firm bones and firm teeth, and the brain is full of glory.[color=#D06508]\n Failure of a break may hurt you.[/color]
Liver is wood, liver and kidney are the same, kidney essence can nourish liver and blood.

Stage.Name: Stage4
Stage.Desc: Repair inside and then outside. Repair limbs and bones.

Neck.Desc: Entering the mystery for the first time, the heavens and the earth came back, and the immortal tragedy was on the lookout. .
Heaven and earth are incompatible,
Forging the god body, thunder and thunder obstructing enlightenment.

In the self-proclaimed supernatural power, and returning to normal, Yuan Ying appeared, breaking the cage of the physical body, which is called the fairyland.[color=#D06508]\nThe higher the perception of this bottleneck, the harder it is to break through.[/color]

Stage.Name: Stage6
Stage.Desc: Standing on Sendai, Chengxian is in sight. It takes a long time.

Neck.Desc: The elders in the holy land or the deserted ancient family are on the first step, that is, the elders who are at the top.[color=#D06508]\n After this bottleneck fails, you need to return to the previous state and break through again.[/color]

斗战胜佛，浑拓，卫易，老疯子和老太婆，盖九幽，乾仑，人魔 等等..[color=#D06508]\n此瓶颈失败后，需回到上一个境界再次突破。[/color]
一念之间，世间万物无不为之战栗。[color=#D06508]\n此瓶颈失败后，需回到上一个境界再次突破。[/color]
如神祗一般，莅临人间，所到之处，万族顶礼膜拜。[color=#D06508]\n此瓶颈失败后，需回到上一个境界再次突破。[/color]
天地间反噬到来，度过劫难仙途在望，反之灰飞烟灭。
